subject: Avoiding IllegalAccessException
msgSnippet: In my testing class I use reflection to test the class under test. This works fine as long as testing class and class under test are in the same package.

In my testing class I use reflection to test the class under test.

This works fine as long as testing class and class under test are in 
the same package. Otherwise IllegalAccessException occure which make 
my test results red.

The Javadoc 1.3 says that this is because the two classes are not in 
the same package.

But in the company we put all tests in a sub package named "test".

Does anyone had such a problem before and know a solution? I mean a 
solution where the two classes are in different packages.

Maybe there is an easy solution for it.
